entry.value: import pandas as pd%%00010%%00010# create an empty string for graph subtitle so errors aren't raised%%00010flow_variables['graph_subtitle'] = ''%%00010flow_variables['prefix'] = ''%%00010flow_variables['suffix'] = ''%%00010%%00010## NORMALIZATION METHODS or data sets to be compared%%00010# create a list containing normalization methods and data sets to be compared/processed%%00010method_list = flow_variables['methods'].split(',')%%00010%%00010# create a list of tests used%%00010methods = []%%00010%%00010if 'selected data + median normalization' in method_list:%%00010%%00009methods.append('0')%%00010%%00009%%00010if 'selected data + quantile normalization' in method_list:%%00010%%00009methods.append('1')%%00010%%00009%%00010if 'selected data + loessF normalization' in method_list:%%00010%%00009methods.append('2')%%00010%%00009%%00010if 'selected data + vsn normalization' in method_list:%%00010%%00009methods.append('3')%%00010%%00010if 'DIA-NN - not norm. data (PG.Quantity columns)' in method_list:%%00010%%00009methods.append('4')%%00010%%00010if 'DIA-NN - norm. data (PG.Normalised columns)' in method_list:%%00010%%00009methods.append('5')%%00010%%00010if 'DIA-NN - norm. prec. sum data (PG.Prec.Norm.Sum columns)' in method_list:%%00010%%00009methods.append('6')%%00010%%00010if 'DIA-NN - MaxLFQ norm. data (PG.MaxLFQ columns)' in method_list:%%00010%%00009methods.append('7')%%00010%%00010flow_variables['methods_no'] = len(methods)%%00010flow_variables['methods_list'] = ','.join(methods)%%00010%%00010## sets the short name of the data to be normalized to be used in the file names and graphs%%00010# first name is meant for the file names, the second is meant for the subtitle of the graphs%%00010data_to_normalize_names_dict = {%%00010%%000090: ['diann-not-norm', 'PG.Quantity data'], %%00010%%000091: ['diann-norm', 'PG.Normalised data'],%%00010%%000092: ['diann-norm-prec-sum', 'PG.Prec.Norm.sum data'],%%00010%%000093: ['diann-maxlfq', 'PG.MaxLFQ data']%%00010%%00009}%%00010%%00010flow_variables['data_to_normalize_file_name_part'] = data_to_normalize_names_dict[flow_variables['data_to_normalize (index)']][0]%%00010flow_variables['data_to_normalize_subtitle_part'] = data_to_normalize_names_dict[flow_variables['data_to_normalize (index)']][1]%%00010%%00010## GRAPHS FOR ALL SAMPLES%%00010# create a list containing graphs%%00010graph_list = flow_variables['graphs'].split(',')%%00010%%00010# create a series of switch variables for every graph%%00010if 'violin plot (width based on count)' in graph_list:%%00010%%00009flow_variables['graph_violin_widthcount'] = 'top'%%00010else:%%00010%%00009flow_variables['graph_violin_widthcount'] = 'bottom'%%00010%%00009%%00010if 'violin plot (width same for all)' in graph_list:%%00010%%00009flow_variables['graph_violin_widthsame'] = 'top'%%00010else:%%00010%%00009flow_variables['graph_violin_widthsame'] = 'bottom'%%00010%%00009%%00010if 'box plot' in graph_list:%%00010%%00009flow_variables['graph_boxplot'] = 'top'%%00010else:%%00010%%00009flow_variables['graph_boxplot'] = 'bottom'%%00010%%00009%%00010if 'kernel density plot' in graph_list:%%00010%%00009flow_variables['graph_density'] = 'top'%%00010else:%%00010%%00009flow_variables['graph_density'] = 'bottom'%%00010%%00009%%00010if 'correlation clustermap (manual center)' in graph_list:%%00010%%00009flow_variables['graph_correlation_manual'] = 'top'%%00010else:%%00010%%00009flow_variables['graph_correlation_manual'] = 'bottom'%%00010%%00010if 'correlation clustermap (automatic center)' in graph_list:%%00010%%00009flow_variables['graph_correlation_automatic'] = 'top'%%00010else:%%00010%%00009flow_variables['graph_correlation_automatic'] = 'bottom'%%00010%%00010if 'hierarchical clustering' in graph_list:%%00010%%00009flow_variables['graph_hierarchy'] = 'top'%%00010else:%%00010%%00009flow_variables['graph_hierarchy'] = 'bottom'%%00010%%00010if 'scatter plot matrix' in graph_list:%%00010%%00009flow_variables['graph_scatter'] = 'top'%%00010else:%%00010%%00009flow_variables['graph_scatter'] = 'bottom'%%00010%%00010if 'scatter plot matrix (MA plots)' in graph_list:%%00010%%00009flow_variables['graph_ma'] = 'top'%%00010else:%%00010%%00009flow_variables['graph_ma'] = 'bottom'%%00010%%00010## GRAPHS FOR SUBSETS%%00010# subset switch, if a subset is going to be plotted individually%%00010if flow_variables['subset_bool'] == 1:%%00010%%00009flow_variables['subset_switch'] = 'top'%%00010else:%%00010%%00009flow_variables['subset_switch'] = 'bottom'%%00010%%00010# create a list of subset graphs%%00010if flow_variables['subset_bool'] == 1:%%00010%%00009subset_graphs_list = flow_variables['subset_graphs'].split(',')%%00010%%00010%%00009if 'violin plot (width based on count)' in subset_graphs_list:%%00010%%00009%%00009flow_variables['subset_violin_widthcount'] = 'top'%%00010%%00009else:%%00010%%00009%%00009flow_variables['subset_violin_widthcount'] = 'bottom'%%00010%%00009%%00010%%00009if 'violin plot (width same for all)' in subset_graphs_list:%%00010%%00009%%00009flow_variables['subset_violin_widthsame'] = 'top'%%00010%%00009else:%%00010%%00009%%00009flow_variables['subset_violin_widthsame'] = 'top'%%00010%%00009else:%%00010%%00009%%00009flow_variables['subset_boxplot'] = 'bottom'%%00010%%00009%%00009%%00010%%00009if 'kernel density plot' in subset_graphs_list:%%00010%%00009%%00009flow_variables['subset_density'] = 'top'%%00010%%00009else:%%00010%%00009%%00009flow_variables['subset_density'] = 'bottom'%%00010%%00009%%00009%%00010%%00009if 'correlation clustermap (manual center)' in subset_graphs_list:%%00010%%00009%%00009flow_variables['subset_correlation_manual'] = subset_graphs_list:%%00010%%00009%%00009flow_variables['subset_correlation_automatic'] = 'top'%%00010%%00009else:%%00010%%00009%%00009flow_variables['subset_correlation_automatic'] = 'bottom'%%00010%%00009%%00010%%00009if 'hierarchical clustering' in subset_graphs_list:%%00010%%00009%%00009flow_variables['subset_hierarchy'] = 'top'%%00010%%00009else:%%00010%%00009%%00009flow_variables['subset_hierarchy'] = 'bottom'%%00010%%00009%%00010%%00009if 'scatter plot matrix' in subset_graphs_list:%%00010%%00009%%00009flow_variables['subset_scatter'] = 'top'%%00010%%00009else:%%00010%%00009%%00009flow_variables['subset_scatter'] = 'bottom'%%00010%%00009%%00010%%00009if 'scatter plot matrix (MA plots)' in subset_graphs_list:%%00010%%00009%%00009flow_variables['subset_ma'] = 'top'%%00010%%00009else:%%00010%%00009%%00009flow_variables['subset_ma'] = 'bottom'%%00010%%00010## COUNTING LOOP%%00010# create a counter for a counting loop and removes any leading or trailing white spaces and empty items from the subsets list flow variable%%00010flow_variables['counting_loop'] = 1%%00010%%00010if flow_variables['subset_bool'] == 1:%%00010%%00009subset_list = list(filter(None, [s.strip() for s in flow_variables['subset_list'].split(',')]))%%00010%%00009flow_variables['counting_loop'] = len(subset_list)%%00010%%00009flow_variables['subset_list'] = ",".join(subset_list)%%00010%%00010## PREFIX AND SUFFIX FOR PLOTS%%00010# alter prefix flow variable%%00010flow_variables['all_prefix'] = flow_variables['all_prefix'].strip()%%00010%%00010if flow_variables['all_prefix'] != '':%%00010%%00009if flow_variables['all_prefix'][-1] != '_':%%00010%%00009%%00009flow_variables['all_prefix'] = flow_variables['all_prefix'] + '_'%%00010%%00010# alter suffix flow variable%%00010flow_variables['all_suffix'] = flow_variables['all_suffix'].strip()%%00010 %%00010if flow_variables['all_suffix'] != '':%%00010%%00009if flow_variables['all_suffix'][0] != '_':%%00010%%00009%%00009flow_variables['all_suffix'] = '_' + flow_variables['all_suffix']%%00010%%00010## SAMPLES TO BE PROCESSED%%00010# list of samples that should be included%%00010flow_variables['sample_list'] = flow_variables['column_selection'].split(',')%%00010%%00010# difference between selected samples and all samples%%00010flow_variables['exclude'] = list()%%00010%%00010# create a list of all samples%%00010flow_variables['all_samples_list'] = [x for x in flow_variables['all_samples'].split(',')]%%00010%%00010for sample in flow_variables['all_samples_list']:%%00010%%00009if sample not in flow_variables['sample_list']:%%00010%%00009%%00009flow_variables['exclude'].append(sample)%%00010%%00010# create a variable for if switch and counting loop%%00010flow_variables['exclude_number'] = len(flow_variables['exclude'])%%00010%%00010if flow_variables['exclude_number'] == 0:%%00010%%00009flow_variables['exclude_switch'] = 'bottom'%%00010else:%%00010%%00009flow_variables['exclude_switch'] = 'top'%%00010%%00010## EXPORT PATH%%00010# create flow variable for file export path%%00010flow_variables['path'] = flow_variables['context.workflow.absolute-path'] + '/__outputs__/figures/' + flow_variables['output_folder'] + '/'%%00010%%00010if flow_variables['output_subfolder'] != '':%%00010%%00009flow_variables['path'] = flow_variables['path'] + flow_variables['output_subfolder'] + '/'
